column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My boyfriend and I love this restaurant! Our favorite dishes are the dates wrapped in bacon
column2: the baked goat cheese with sauce and garlic bread
column3: the pork belly skewer (yum) and the ribs with the manchego mashed potatoes. Â We ordered a half a pitcher of red sangria for the two of us which was the perfect amount. We also each checked in on Yelp to get a free dessert tapas. We got the chocolate truffle
column4: and the caramelized banana with ice cream which were both delicious! The servers were very attentive
column5: and cleared our plates frequently. We made reservations online for 5:30 and we had no trouble being seated immediately. We also took the train which was a few blocks away
column6: so we could enjoy as much sangria as we wanted. We had so much fun here!
